lemma cbelow_on_monom_mult: assumes "dickson_grading d" and "F \<subseteq> dgrad_p_set d m" and "d t \<le> m" and "c \<noteq> 0" and "cbelow_on (dgrad_p_set d m) (\<prec>\<^sub>p) z (\<lambda>a b. red F a b \<or> red F b a) p q" shows "cbelow_on (dgrad_p_set d m) (\<prec>\<^sub>p) (monom_mult c t z) (\<lambda>a b. red F a b \<or> red F b a) (monom_mult c t p) (monom_mult c t q)"
